import React from 'react' import hero from '../../assets/hero/hero-image-light.jpeg' import darkHero from '../../assets/hero/hero-image-dark.jpeg' import { Contacts } from '../contacts/Contacts' import CV from '../../assets/CV/CV.pdf' import { RiDownload2Line } from 'react-icons/ri' import './about.css' export const About = ({isLightModeOn}) => { return (

I am Sergii

I enjoy the development of web solutions

Download CV
) }
